verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Even by President Donald Trump ’s standards] , [ARG1: the Memorial Day weekend] [V: was] [ARG2: memorable] [ARGM-CAU: for the sheer volume of balderdash , bunk , poppycock and patent nonsense flowing from the White House] .

Even by President Donald Trump ’s standards , the Memorial Day weekend was memorable for the sheer volume of [ARG1: balderdash , bunk , poppycock and patent nonsense] [V: flowing] [ARGM-DIR: from the White House] .
